Header: UPDATE: IGP Pujith Jayasunadara granted bail
Content: UPDATE: 1.57 PM: IGP Pujith Jayasundara who was arrested by the CID today, has been granted bail on a surety of Rs. 200,000 by the Fort Magistrate Court. Colombo (News 1st): IGP Pujith Jayasundara, who is currently on compulsory leave has been arrested by the Criminal Investigations Department. Police Media Spokesperson SP Ruwan Gunasekara said he has been arrested onÂ charges of threatening the elevator operator at Police Headquarters in 2017. He is due to be produced before the court.
